per_frame_21=q12=.4+cos(atime*.00613828348)*.4;
per_frame_22=q13=.4+sin(atime*.00598593455)*.4;

per_frame_29=q3=q30;
per_pixel_1=dx = if(above(x, q1), dx + .2*sin(time/2), dx - .2*cos(time/2));

per_pixel_3=rot = rot + .8*tan(rad);
warp_1=`sampler sampler_VITRIOL;
warp_2=`shader_body
warp_3=`{
warp_4=`
warp_5=`ret.xyz = tex2D(sampler_main, uv_orig).xyz*float3(.97,1,.97) - float3(.03,0,.03);
warp_6=`
warp_7=`ret.z += GetBlur1(uv_orig).z*.45;
warp_8=`ret.x += GetBlur1(uv_orig).z*.05 + GetBlur3(uv_orig).z*.05;
warp_9=`float4 noise9 = tex3D(sampler_noisevol_hq, 
warp_10=`                      ((uv.xyy*q27
warp_11=`                       )*texsize.xyy*texsize_noisevol_hq.zww
warp_12=`                      ).xyz*
warp_13=`                      float3(1,1,0)*0.05 + 
warp_14=`                      time*float3(0,0,1)*q29
warp_15=`                     );
warp_16=`if(ret.x> q21*q13         && ret.x<= q24*q11        )ret.y += (noise9).x*.5; 
warp_17=`if(ret.y> q22*q11         && ret.y<= q25*q12        )ret.z += (noise9).y*.5; 
warp_18=`if(ret.z> q23*q12         && ret.z<= q26*q13        )ret.x += (noise9).z*.5; 
warp_19=`ret.z -= ret.x;
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float2 pixelsize = texsize.zw;
warp_22=`ret.y = saturate(tex2D( sampler_pw_main,uv_orig).y);
warp_23=`
warp_24=`float1 conway = tex2D( sampler_pw_main, uv_orig + float2(-1,-1)*pixelsize).y;
warp_25=`       conway += tex2D( sampler_VITRIOL, uv_orig + float2(0,-1)*pixelsize).y;
warp_26=`       conway += tex2D( sampler_pw_main, uv_orig + float2(1,-1)*pixelsize).y;
warp_27=`       conway += tex2D( sampler_VITRIOL, uv_orig + float2(-1,0)*pixelsize).y;
warp_28=`       conway += tex2D( sampler_pw_main, uv_orig + float2(1,0)*pixelsize).y;
warp_29=`       conway += tex2D( sampler_noise_hq, uv_orig + float2(-1,1)*pixelsize).y;
warp_30=`       conway += tex2D( sampler_pw_main, uv_orig + float2(0,1)*pixelsize).y;
warp_31=`       conway += tex2D( sampler_noise_lq, uv_orig + float2(1,1)*pixelsize).y;
warp_32=`
warp_33=`float1 test = q5*(1-GetBlur1(uv_orig).y)*(1-GetBlur2(uv_orig).y)*(1-GetBlur3(uv_orig).y);
warp_34=`
warp_35=`conway -= tex2D( sampler_pw_main, uv_orig).x;
warp_36=`
warp_37=`
warp_38=`if (conway > 0) {
warp_39=`if (saturate(ret.y) == 0) {
warp_40=`ret.y = floor(test*1.8)*q1;
warp_41=`}
warp_42=`}
warp_43=`
warp_44=`ret.y -= ret.x;
warp_45=`
warp_46=`ret.xyz -= 1-q2;
warp_47=`}
comp_1=`shader_body
comp_2=`{  
comp_3=`    ret = tex2D(sampler_main, uv).xyz;
comp_4=`
comp_5=`
